form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: RECORD OF ILLEGAL ALIEN APPREHENDED OR LOCATED, I-213 ( (Rev. 7-1-67)

Figeroa, Santa Ana, Calif. 6/67 Present Narrative (Outline particulars under which alien located/apprehended and furnish details re time, place and manner of last entry) Subject claims he and his wife enttered as stated above, Shortly after finding employment arrangements were made with a woman (unknown) in SYS area to bring in subject's five(5) children. Apparently they were entered as the woman's children and then to Ansheim at the above address.
